name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HNRelevant - Related stories on Hacker News

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Hacker News experience and gain new insights by exploring relevant stories and discussions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Explore related submissions to the one you're viewing on Hacker News. This extension helps you immerse yourself in interesting discussions and uncover overlooked gems.

Features:
- Related submissions ready to be explored
- Ability to fine-tune the search query and fetch results in place
- Two modes:
    - Automatic: Enjoy a seamless experience with results generated upon page load
    - Manual: Search only when desired
- The result blends naturally with Hacker News's interface and match its look and feel
- Manageable preferences via the extension's popup in the browser toolbar
